TODO: we should create an interface for attachments
TODO: OpenWAAO<-->attachment-style metadata conversion

hasId.description:
Checks if entity has an id.
If entity composite compose ids, it will check them all.

save.description:
Saves current entity in the database.
If entity does not exist in the database then inserts, otherwise updates.

remove.description: Removes current entity from the database.

softRemove.description: Records the delete date of current entity.

recover.description: Recovers a given entity in the database.

reload.description: Reloads entity data from the database.
